title: Direct x error when my graphics card is enabled, game starts when it's disabled
body:
Hey, so when I have my graphics card enabled, the game wont start I get the direct x error, when I have it disabled, the game starts, but I have like 7 fps running off cpu. I've tried repair tool, my drivers are up to date, tried deleting game.cfg, tried disabling and re enabling, I've tried enabling while in game after having it disabled and i just get a black screen but sound works.

I have a geforce gtx 780, if you could help would be deeply appreciated, thanks

replies.body: Anyone know a fix? it's really frustrating haven't been able to play league for a long time
Can someone please help me out with this, is it a graphics card issue? It runs fortnite fine
